text: Today’s Mandarin article is talking about animals at the zoo.There is an idiom used: 各种各样 which means “all kinds of”.动物园真是一个有趣的地方。在这里你可以看到各种各样的动物。有黑白颜色可爱的大熊猫。有正在开屏，五颜六色的孔雀。有正在爬树的猴子。有脖子长长的长颈鹿。有鼻子细长，身体庞大的大象。还有我最喜欢的老虎。The zoo really is a fun place. Here you can see a wide variety of animals.Cute pandas with black and white colors.There are colorful peacocks displaying their tail feathers.There are monkeys who are climbing trees.Giraffes with very long necks.Elephants with a slender noses and large bodies.There are also my favorite animals, tigers.1 – 什么地方很有趣？a. 邮局b. 警察局c. 动物园d. 医院2 – 长颈鹿的脖子看起来怎么样？a. 胖胖的b. 长长的c. 细细的d. 小小的1. c2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
